/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const Navbar = () => { const [isOpen, setOpen] = useState(false); return (
setOpen(!isOpen)} >
Home search saved
); }; export default Navbar;
